newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Tredegar Q2 shr $1.25 with gain.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Tredegar Q2 shr $1.25 with gain.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
Note: The company said its earnings include a net after-tax gain of $2.9 million, or $0.22 per share, related to the sale of equity investments in the company's technology segment.

The $1.25 per share figure also includes a nonrecurring after-tax gain of $1.4 million, or $0.11 per share, related to the sale of preferred stock received in connection with last years divestiture of a molded plastics subsidiary.
Excluding investment gains and nonrecurring items, the second-quarter net income from operations was $12.0 million, or $0.92 per share.
Excluding investment gains and nonrecurring items, year-to-date net income was $21,792,000 or $1.66 per share, versus $16,961,000 or $1.30 per share, in 1996.

Year-to-date results for 1997 include after-tax gains totaling $4.1 million, or $0.31 per share, related to the sale of equity investments in the company's technology segment, and an after-tax gain of $1.4 million, or $0.11 per share, generated by the sale of preferred stock related to last years divestiture of a molded plastics subsidiary.
Results for the first six months of 1996 include a net after-tax gain of $8.1 million, or $0.62 cents per share, related to divestitures.
